00094   
00097       BeEvent(LCObject* obj) : LCGenericObjectImplExt(obj) 
00098   { 
00099     assert ( _obj->getNFloat() == 0 );
00100     assert ( _obj->getNDouble() == 0 );
00101     assert ( _obj->getNInt() == kNBeEventIntValues );
00102   }

00108   BeEvent &setBoardID(int boardID) {obj()->setIntVal(kBeEventIntValBoardId,boardID); return *this;};
00109 
00111   int getBoardID() const {return getIntVal(kBeEventIntValBoardId);};
00112 
00113 
00115   BeEvent& setRecordLabel(int label) {
00116     obj()->setIntVal(kBeEventIntValRecLabel, label);
00117     return *this;
00118   };
00119 
00121   short getRecordLabel() const {
00122     return (short) ( getIntVal(kBeEventIntValRecLabel) & 0xff);
00123   };

00181   void print(  std::ostream& os) {
00182     os << " board: " << BoardID(getBoardID()) << std::endl
00183        << " record label: " << getRecordLabel() << std::endl 
00184        << " status: " << getStatusWord() << std::endl
00185        << " l1acounter: " << getL1aCounter() << std::endl
00186        << " bxcounter: " << getBxCounter() << std::endl
00187        << " qdrframecounter: " << getQdrFrameCounter() << std::endl
00188        << " qdrdatacounter: " << getQdrDataCounter() << std::endl
00189        << " totalframecounter: " << getTotalFrameCounter() << std::endl;
00190     os << std::endl;
00191   };
